title: Kompyuter Savodxonligi
description: Kompyuterdan foydalana olish, Microsoft Office, internetdan unumli foydalanish bo‘yicha asosiy bilimlar.

title: 3D Modelling
description: Blender yoki boshqa 3D dasturlardan foydalangan holda model yaratish, chizish, animatsiya qilish.

title: Grafik Dizayn
description: Photoshop, Illustrator, CorelDRAW orqali logotip, banner, vizitka va boshqa grafik ishlanmalar yaratish.

title: IT uchun Ingliz Tili
description: IT sohasida ishlash uchun texnik ingliz tilidagi terminlar, o‘qish, tinglash va yozish ko‘nikmalarini rivojlantirish.

title: Frontend
description: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React bilan web UI yaratish. Responsive dizayn, API bilan bog‘lanish.

title: SMM Kursi
description: Ijtimoiy tarmoqlarda marketing, kontent yaratish, analytics, reklamalar bilan ishlash.

title: Robototexnika
description: Arduino yoki LEGO orqali robot yig‘ish, dasturlash, sensorlar bilan ishlash.

title: Mobile Developer
description: Flutter orqali iOS va Android ilovalar yaratish.

title: Foundation (Python)
description: Python asoslari, algoritmlar, backendga tayyorlov bosqichi.

title: Backend
description: Python Django yoki Node.js orqali web serverlar, API lar yaratish, ma’lumotlar bazasi bilan ishlash.
